name: Back Home for a Summer DEMO
name_original: Back Home for a Summer DEMO
description:
After a long and grueling year away at your boarding school, you return back to your small island hometown for summer break. Oddly, all of your childhood friends seem to have been avoiding the town during the summer months. Is it due to the violent monsoons? Or is it something else?

You find three people who you grow closer to along your adventure on the island. Share deep and meaningful interactions with them as you discover more about their lives.

✦✦

Pebble(All pronouns): Your childhood best friend and biggest source of support from birth. A soft, sweet person who struggles with social situations.

Mercy(Hy/Pixel): A kind stranger you meet at an arcade. Hy loves gaming and has trouble finding any passion for other studies.

Ginseng(They/It/Ghost): A mysterious fox spirit you find after stumbling upon their grave. Loves causing trouble and mischief wherever it goes, but perhaps hidden under that bright facade is a secret side to them?

✦✦

This is a demo/prototype for this game:

✦ Contains about 3k words in total

✦ Basic introductions to each of the characters and plot

✦ LGBTQ+ friendly game with gender neutral protagonist and gender non-specified love interests

Expectations for the completed game:

✦ Three different routes for each character

✦ Multiple endings

✦ A secret true ending

✦ User input pronouns for the main character

✦ Numerous cgs and bonus scenes

✦ A potential bonus/secret character???

✦✦

Thank you so much for all your support! I made this demo in seven days and it really took the energy out of me. I hope you enjoy this game and continue to support me in the future!
